Article.ArticleTitle: Long-COVID: Cognitive deficits (brain fog) and brain lesions in non-hospitalized patients.

AffiliationInfo.Affiliation: Centre de Neurologie Cognitive Université de Paris APHP Hôpital Lariboisière 75010 Paris France; Clinique de la Mémoire 16 rue de Téhéran 75008 Paris France. Electronic address: jacques.hugon@inserm.fr.
